stem.paragraph: Match each description in the left column with the area that it describes by selecting the appropriate cell on the right.

page.prompt: CORRECTLY MATCH THE ITEMS. THEN SELECT SUBMIT TO RECEIVE FEEDBACK.

row_text.row: View commands to change map Type.

feedbacks.feedback: Incorrect. One or more of your answers is incorrect. Please try again.
Correct! You have correctly matched each description with the area it describes. Click the Next Arrow to continue.
Incorrect. You have not correctly matched each description to the area it describes. Click the Next Arrow to continue.
